content: Walking through Times Square now. The energy here is electric, but part of me still misses the serene chaos of Tokyo. Time to embrace the new and see what NYC has in store for me.
Feeling 22 and it’s a trip. Grateful for the journey, the lessons, and the upcoming adventures. Here’s to learning, growing, and trading my way through the next chapter. Bring it on!
Today, as I pack for Tokyo, I'm hit with a wave of gratitude. 22 feels like the start of something real. Here’s to new challenges, learning, and maybe even some epic fails. Ready to make my mark.
